stateflow_data_no_underscore_at_start.description: Stateflow data names shall not begin with an underscore.

stateflow_data_no_underscore_at_end.description: Stateflow data names shall not end with an underscore.

stateflow_data_no_consecutive_underscore.description: Stateflow data names shall not contain consecutive underscores.

stateflow_data_not_reserved_matlab_word.description: Stateflow data names shall not consist solely of a single reserved MATLAB keyword.

stateflow_data_max_length.description: Stateflow data name length shall be a maximum of 63 characters.
